resources.string: Stored with zero access encryption

This message is stored in your mailbox with zero‑access encryption. Neither Proton nor anyone else can read it. However, a sender or recipient not using Proton Mail may have a non-encrypted copy stored on their email server.
End-to-end encrypted message
Like all messages, it is stored on Proton servers using zero‑access encryption.
Proton end-to-end encrypted from verified sender
This message is protected with automatic Proton end‑to‑end encryption, and we verified it was sent by the stated sender.
Proton end-to-end encrypted with failed verification
This message is protected with automatic Proton end‑to‑end encryption. However, the sender verification failed. Please confirm the authenticity of the message with your contact.
PGP end-to-end encrypted

This message is protected with PGP end-to-end encryption. It is encrypted on the sender\'s device and can only be decrypted by the recipient. Like all messages, it is stored on Proton servers using zero-access encryption.
PGP end-to-end encrypted and signed

This message is protected with PGP end-to-end encryption. It is encrypted on the sender\'s device and can only be decrypted by the recipient. Additionally, the signature proves to the recipient that your message is genuine and hasn\'t been tampered with.
PGP end-to-end encrypted from verified contact

This message is protected with PGP end‑to‑end encryption. It is encrypted on the sender’s device and can only be decrypted by the recipient. Additionally, we verified the message was sent by the stated sender.
PGP end-to-end encrypted with failed verification

This message is protected with PGP end‑to‑end encryption. It is encrypted on the sender’s device and can only be decrypted by the recipient. However, the sender verification failed. Please confirm the authenticity of the message with your contact.
PGP signed message

This message was not sent with end-to-end encryption, but is stored on Proton servers using zero-access encryption. You have also digitally signed it, proving to the recipient that your message is genuine and hasn\'t been tampered with.
PGP-signed message from verified contact
This message was not sent with end-to-end-encryption, but is stored on Proton servers using zero-access-encryption. We also verified that the message was sent by the stated sender.
PGP-signed message with failed verification

This message was not sent with end-to-end-encryption, but is stored on Proton servers using zero-access-encryption. However, the sender verification failed. Please confirm the authenticity of the message with your contact.
